m_szDocTitle: Audi Q8 h-Tron Quattro Concept Swaps In Hydrogen Fuel Cell For e-Tron's Battery
m_szDocSumamry: Audi Q8 h-Tron Quattro Concept Swaps In Hydrogen Fuel Cell For e-Tron's Battery Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 3,997 views Jan 14, 2016 Follow John Add to circle Hot on the heels of the all-electric Audi e-Tron Quattro Concept it revealed last fall, VW Group's luxury brand Audi has released a second iteration of the same concept. This one still has all four wheels powered by electric motors, but the electricity to run them comes not from a large battery pack but a hydrogen fuel cell. The orange Audi h-Tron Quattro Con
